lead_paragraph: A picture caption last Sunday with an article in some editions about the impact of special teams in the N.F.L. reversed the outcome of the game between the Washington Redskins and New Orleans Saints in which Reggie Bush, who was shown evading tacklers, returned a punt for a Saints touchdown. The Redskins won.
